thread.title: Trump consultants harvested data from 50M Facebook users: reports

title: Trump consultants harvested data from 50M Facebook users: reports
text:
Trump consultants harvested data from 50M Facebook users: reports 4:06pm GMT - 01:10 
Facebook on Friday said it was suspending political data analytics firm Cambridge Analytica, which worked for President Donald Trump’s 2016 election campaign, after finding data privacy policies had been violated.   
Facebook on Friday said it was suspending political data analytics firm Cambridge Analytica, which worked for President Donald Trump’s 2016 election campaign, after finding data privacy policies had been violated.  //reut.rs/2IvRmow
